lines: Atu libambe kulwana mubi, Tu lwanine Mufutuli;
Bweza zilwanyo tuime tonse, Muyume mujwi lyakwe Mwami.
Tuyume tonse kulwana mubi, Tumu tondezya kasimpe,
Intobo yesu nku kusalala, Mu kasimpe tuya kukoma.
Mwami wa bonse kotu telela, No tukuita Siluse,
Nkondo yamana tonse twa zunda, Tupe musyini utamani.
